about_the_game:
Sportsball Pack containing six ball customizations including American Football, Baseball, Basketball, Football, Tennis ball, and Volleyball.



Holidays Part 1 (Halloween) containing three ball customizations including Dead Face, Vampire, and Eyeball.
Holidays Part 2 (Christmas) containing three ball customizations including Belt, Snowman, and Pudding.



Deluxe Hats containing six hat customizations including Bicorn, Capotain, Mage, Santa, Top hat, and Knight.
detailed_description:
Sportsball Pack containing six ball customizations including American Football, Baseball, Basketball, Football, Tennis ball, and Volleyball.



Holidays Part 1 (Halloween) containing three ball customizations including Dead Face, Vampire, and Eyeball.
Holidays Part 2 (Christmas) containing three ball customizations including Belt, Snowman, and Pudding.



Deluxe Hats containing six hat customizations including Bicorn, Capotain, Mage, Santa, Top hat, and Knight.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® 700 Series (Maxwell) / AMD Radeon™ RX 400 Series / AMD Ryzen™ Processors with Radeon™ Vega Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Medium".
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon™ RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Highest".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 745 / AMD Radeon™ R7 260 (VRAM 2GB) / AMD Ryzen™ CPU with Radeon™ Vega Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Medium".
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon™ RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Highest".

short_description: Includes additional ball customizations starting with the Sportsball Pack containing six ball customizations including American Football, Baseball, Basketball, Football, Tennis ball, and Volleyball.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
